en: Christmas in Auray 2022, it's 3 weekends of festivities! Markets, ice rink, magical animations... Enjoy the 2 markets of nearly 110 craftsmen installed in magical decorations on the Place Notre-Dame and the Petit-Th√©√¢tre, Place de la Pompe. Christmas is also free animations, shows, music and games to be found the weekend of December 9-10-11 and 16-17-18.Finally, come and welcome Santa Claus at the port of Saint-Goustan on December 9 in the evening and enjoy the sound and light show, as well as the concert! Complete program ? here

From 8 to 24 December 2022. Christmas in Auray 2022, it's 3 weekends of festivities! Markets, ice rink, magical animations... The Christmas market will take place from December 9 to 24, 2022, from 10am to 7pm at Place Notre Dame in Auray. Complete program here

From December 7, a wind of magic will blow on the town of Auray with the launch of the illuminations which will be deployed throughout the town. From December 14th, the artists' village, the children's village and the Christmas market will welcome this year nearly 80 exhibitors, craftsmen, artists, passionate creators: jewelry, decorations, gourmet specialties ... To delight your gift ideas while enjoying some delicacies, mulled wine, pancakes ... In a warm atmosphere. Numerous animations for young and old, concerts and shows... will punctuate this festive period. Don't forget the arrival of Santa Claus by boat in St Goustan on Friday 14th at 6.30 pm and the traditional Christmas mulled wine snack offered by the town hall on Sunday 23rd December from 4 pm. Program available at the Tourist Office and online by clicking on "Download the document (pdf)
